sentences.sentence: He felt a sudden inexpressible loneliness.
sentences.translation: 他突然有种难以言喻的孤独感。

sentences.sentence: The North part of Russia possesses an inexpressible beauty of nature and fascinating historical monuments.
sentences.translation: 俄罗斯北部地区有着无法言传的自然美景和迷人的历史遗迹。

sentences.sentence: Yet it is flexible, too, as shown by its success in depicting varying shades of mood, in expressing those more intimate emotions which are so very nearly inexpressible.
sentences.translation: 但是它也是灵活的，可以从它成功地描写了情绪的不同层面，表达了那些细腻的几乎无法表达的感情看出来。
